error.failed_to_cache: Failed to download the custom templates from the remote sources. Please check the URLs and try again.

content-html-url.label: HTML template URL
content-html-url.helper_text: Enter a URL to load a custom HTML template from a remote source.

content-text-url.label: Text template URL
content-text-url.helper_text: Enter a URL to load a custom text template from a remote source.

content-html-warning.text: As you are caching from a remote template URL, we recommend making changes in your remote template directly and recaching the changes. Any changes made locally within the administration could be lost if the remote template is cached again.

content-text-warning.text: As you are caching from a remote template URL, we recommend making changes in your remote template directly and recaching the changes. Any changes made locally within the administration could be lost if the remote template is cached again.

delete.delete_prompt: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete this email template?
